New Records: Jackson Jobe recorded his first Major League strikeout.
Key Match Events: Jackson Jobe pitched three hitless innings.
Sean Guenther was efficient with nine pitches in the ninth inning.
Pre-Game Insights: Manager A.J. Hinch emphasized the importance of getting Jackson Jobe some work before the playoffs.
The Tigers were preparing for their AL Wild Card Series by testing their roster.
Post-Match Reflections: Manager A.J. Hinch praised Jackson Jobe's performance and efficiency.
Jackson Jobe expressed that getting his first Major League strikeout was super special.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game experienced a 2-hour, 20-minute rain delay before the first pitch.
The Tigers' six-game winning streak was snapped.
